name: Mask A Doc
description:
Mask A Doc! Drag and drop masks onto doctors. You have to go fast! After 3 misses, it's game over.

*If an error occurs on launching the game, refresh your browser and try again.*

Leave your high score in the comments!

----

Donating a mask is easier in real life! If you've got masks or other PPE at home, consider donating them to healthcare workers on the front lines. Check out  mask-match.com and getusppe.org.

----

Developed by Mike Salyh. https://www.salyh.com

Music: Werq by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4616-werq
